structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Rate on business inventories levied by fiscal court.
law.text: Subject to the provisions of KRS 68.245, a county fiscal court may levy a rate on business inventories equal to or less than the prevailing rate of taxation on other tangible personal property in the respective county.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 319, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1980.
